name: Raumquelle
description:
Use headphones at 75% and reload the web page when the game is fully cached for the best possible experience. 

Controls: WASD for player movement MOUSE for camera pan.

Experimental project for the "Experimente zur Raumwahnermung und zum räumlichen Vorstellungsvermögen Architekturschaffender"

Made with lots of love by Jakob Darja Segun Daniel and Sam
